Class Field¶

class app.field.Field(name, value='')[source]¶

Bases: object

The generic class representing any field of an entry. Every field has a name and a value.

static _Field__clean(value)¶

Remove all E{lb},E{rb},[,], and other BibTeX commands. For example:: {‘e} -> &eacute; :type value: str :param value: The string to convert. :rtype: str :return: The cleaned value.

__init__(name, value='')[source]¶
Parameters:
  • name (str) – The name of the field.
  • value (str) – The value of the field.
format()[source]¶

Correctly format the value of this field according to the BibTeX standard.

getACMValue()[source]¶

Get the value of this field in HTML format following the ACM style. @see: toHTML. :return: The value in HTML encoding.

getHTMLValue()[source]¶

Get the value of this field in HTML format. @see: toHTML. :return: The value in HTML encoding.

getHtmlDefaultValue()[source]¶

Get the value of this field in HTML format following the default style. @see: toHTML. :return: The value in HTML encoding.

getName()[source]¶

Get the name of this field. :rtype: str :return: The name of the field.

getValue()[source]¶

Get the value of this field. :rtype: str :return: The value of the field.

isEmpty()[source]¶

Verfies if the field does not have a value. :rtype: bool :return: True if the value is empty, False otherwise.

setValue(value)[source]¶

Set the value for this field. :type value: str :param value: The value of the field.

static simplify(value)[source]¶

Strip all special characters in a string. For example:: a{‘a}a or a’{a}a -> aaa :type value: str :param value: The string to simplify. :rtype: str :return: The simplified value.

static toHTML(value)[source]¶

Convert all BibTeX special commands into HTML encodings. For example:: {‘e} -> &eacute; or ‘{e} -> &eacute; :type value: str :param value: The string to convert. :rtype: str :return: The value in HTML encoding.
